body:
ConRAD on http://www.openentry.dk converts a 3DStudio file (including the
texture mapping) into Radiance quite well...
The free version doesn't support the textures though :)

I have some renderings in my rendering comparison on http://asro.sbuild.com
that used it.

--- stefkeB ---

_________________________________________________________________
Download MSN Explorer gratis van http://explorer.msn.nl/intl.asp
subject: [Radiance-general] Re: VRML -> Radiance translator ?
